text: (geudaega geudeul-eul bol ttaemyeon geudaeneun geudeul-ui oegwan-eul ma-eum-e deul-eohal geos-imyeo, geudeul-i mal-eul hal ttaemyeon geudaeneun geudeul-ui mal-eul gyeongcheonghal geos-ila. geudeul-eun machi )byeog-e( majdaeeojin namudungchiwa gatnola. geudeul-eun modeun oechim-i geudeul-ege bullihan geos-ila saeng-gaghadeola. geudeul-eun jeog-ini geudae(muhammadeu)neun geudeul-e yuuihala. hananimkkeseo geudeul-eul pamyeolsikigileul. geudeul-eun eotteohge dol-aseondan mal-inga
